name: Veggie Carbonara Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add garlic and mushrooms and saut√© for three minutes.
Turn heat to low and add remaining ingredients. Toss to combine and cook until heated through. Divide amongst plates and serve with lemon wedges.
